articles.title: Myanmar army bombs hospital in Rakhine state killing at least 31 people
articles.summary: Myanmar army bombs hospital in Rakhine state killing at least 31 people Topic: Unrest, Conflict and War 17h ago 17 hours ago Thu 11 Dec 2025 at 1:40pm The hospital in Rakhine state was reportedly destroyed by the air strike. ( AFP/STR ) In short: At least 31 people have been killed after the Myanmar military bombed a hospital in Rakhine state. The strike killed women and children, aid workers said. The army has increased air strikes year-on-year
